## Discussion

This property determines which cards are shown in the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassViewController] class’s intro screen. The property defaults to `nil`, and the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassViewController] shows all the networks for the card’s region. To specify a single network, assign a constant to the property. See Payment Networks in [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest].

# paymentNetwork

**Instance Property**

The payment network.

## Declaration

```swift
var paymentNetwork: PKPaymentNetwork? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines which cards are shown in the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassViewController] class’s intro screen. The property defaults to `nil`, and the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassViewController] shows all the networks for the card’s region. To specify a single network, assign a constant to the property. See Payment Networks in [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest].

## Filtering pass libraries

- **primaryAccountIdentifier**: A primary account identifier, used to filter out pass libraries.
- **requiresFelicaSecureElement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the payment pass requires the Felica Secure Element.
